title: Bug 2345 [Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345 [Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: Open a new basic project and create a new file named test.xml. The default editor for XML files is the scripted resource editor example. Select test.xml in the Navigator and choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'. Note that nothing happens and the scripted resource editor example is reactivated.
EB: When selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' for a file that is already open in a different editor type, a new editor should be opened on the file instead of reactivating the existing editor.
SR:
1. Open a new basic project.
2. Create a new file named 'test.xml'.
3. Select 'test.xml' in the Navigator.
4. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'.
5. Verify that a new editor is opened on the file, considering the different editor type.

NOTES: The current behavior is incorrect as it reactivates the existing editor instead of opening a new one based on the editor type.
